quick_answer.text: A standard shot of 80-proof tequila contains about 97 kcal, all from alcohol.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a shot of tequila?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 kcal for a 1.5 fl oz shot of 80-proof tequila.

faqs.q: Does tequila have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Pure tequila has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; calories are purely from alcohol.

faqs.q: What affects calories in tequila shots?
faqs.a: Proof (alcohol percentage), serving size, and additives like flavors or mixers increase calories.

faqs.q: Is tequila lower in calories than other spirits?
faqs.a: Similar to vodka or gin at the same proof—about 97 kcal per shot—without carbs from mixers.

faqs.q: How many shots equal a standard drink?
faqs.a: One 1.5 fl oz shot of 80-proof tequila is one standard drink, providing ~97 kcal.
